ValidationRule.description: SF-113 This validation rule should ensure, that all Zip Codes are in the correct format according to their respective country. Format ("\\d{3}[-]\\d{4}"). Example: 999-9999.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(MailingPostalCode)), MailingCountry == "JP"), NOT(REGEX(MailingPostalCode, ("\\d{3}[-]\\d{4}"))),FALSE) && $Permission.Core_Contact_Bypass_Validation_Rules = FALSE
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a valid format for the Zip Code! This should start with three numbers, followed by a hyphen and four numbers. Example: 999-9999
